ComicInfo.Title: Vengeance, Part 3
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Stockman Swarm engulfs NYC searching high and low for the Turtles. The Turtles are on the run and desperate. Will they be able to find sanctuary before it’s too late?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mateus Santolouco | 1 | B | Cover B | Kevin Eastman (a) & Ronda Pattison (c) | 2 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Valerio Schiti (a) & Claudia SG Ianniciello (c) | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 00:20:24. [CVDB493822]
ComicInfo.Writer: Kevin Eastman, Bobby Curnow, Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Claudia ScarletGothica, Kevin Eastman, Mateus Santolouco, Ronda Pattison, Valerio Schiti

ComicInfo.Teams: Flyborgs, Foot Clan, New York Police Department, Purple Dragons, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
